suite.name: VerifyAllValidationsForLoginTest

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: /Users/Gieno/Documents/workspace/optimy/geckodriver-1.log

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Given User is currently at Login page
Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: When User inputs ${email} as email address
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text '' into text field '//input[contains(@class, 'email') and @autocomplete='on']'.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then Verify the error message for email field is ${email_inline_error_message}
Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//span[@for='email']' contains exact text 'This field is required.'.

kw.name: And Verify the error message for password field is ${password_inline_error_message}

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

suite.doc: This test suite contains all the negative test scenarios of login page
